name: 3D Platformer - Early Access
description:
I only have two modifications for my game this time because I was sick these last few days and I just didn't have a lot of energy to work so this will be another classic case of a game releasing without all of the promised content.

My two modifications are my two levels, I wanted to go for more platform and parkour elements, and I had some larger ideas to implement but like I said above, just wasn't really feeling it. I was also mad because I didn't realize those robot prefabs were there and they looked awesome, and I wished I had used them. 

Side note: All the music tracks for the levels absolutely bang and I wish I could listen to them on Spotify.

Created by Nick Garijo
